name: huggingface_search_spaces
description: Search Spaces (demos) on Hugging Face. Returns space names, authors, and SDK types.

steps.code: const results = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('article, main a[href]:has(h4)'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 15); i++) { const c = cards[i]; const titleEl = c.querySelector('h4'); if (!titleEl) continue; const link = c.closest('a[href]') || c.querySelector('a[href]') || c; const spans = Array.from(c.querySelectorAll('span')).map(s => s.textContent.trim()).filter(Boolean); results.push({ name: titleEl.textContent.trim(), url: link.href || '', meta: spans.slice(0, 5) }); } return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results };
steps.name: results
steps.label: Extract spaces
